nodes.text: This clone served as a clone trooper pilot in the Grand Army of the Republic. During his service, he piloted an AT-TE in the 501st Legion, serving under the command of Clone Captain CT-7567 "Rex" and Jedi General Anakin Skywalker. During the Battle of Bothawui, the clone pilot led squadrons of AT-TEs in a flanking maneuver, and when Captain Rex affirmed that the tanks were in position, the clone ordered all ground vehicles to open fire on the Separatist Alliance fleet.
The clone had unique Phase I armor painted with black and gold markings as well as the Republic emblem in red on either side of his helmet.
The clone tank pilot, albeit unnamed, first appeared in the first season episode, "Downfall of a Droid." Like all other clone troopers, he was voiced by Dee Bradley Baker.
